chapters.title: Chapter 8:  The Seven-Striped Lass
chapters.info: Lopin, p. 148—One of Mat's Redarms. He has a round belly, little hair, a blocky face, and a beard that nearly reaches his chest. He grew up in Tear. He once helped Mat escape Ebou Dar. He has since been killed by the gholam. He used to complain that Mat did not have proper shoes for going to the outhouse at night.
